page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: Farming is the major industry in this area.Most of the land is for crops like wheat, barley, peas, beans, sugar beet. In some places the countryside is open with only a few hedges but some farmers have been planting more trees recenty.If you look on old maps you will see where many hedges were. A farmer in Thwaite told us about his farm of 700 acres. He told us that he likes living here because he likes the peace and quiet of the countryside. A different farmer grows wheat, barley, beans and corn.He has a small farm of about 150 acres. He told us that his farm is 600 years old. Another farmer has a farm of 333 acres.He keeps 80 beef cattle. One of the crops he grows is oil seed rape. This is used to make margarine.
